# Time: O(N) | Space: O(1)
```cpp
class Solution {
public:
    bool lemonadeChange(vector<int>& bills) {
        if (bills[0] == 10 || bills[0] == 20)
            return false;
        int bill_5 = 0;
        int bill_10 = 0;
        int bill_20 = 0;
        for (int i = 0; i < bills.size(); i++) {
            if (bills[i] == 5) {
                bill_5++;
            } else if (bills[i] == 10 && bill_5 > 0) {
                bill_10++;
                bill_5--;
            } else if (bills[i] == 20) {
                if (bill_5 > 0 && bill_10 > 0) {
                    bill_10--;
                    bill_5--;
                } else if (bill_5 >= 3) {
                    bill_5 -= 3;
                } else return false;
            } else
                return false;
        }
        return true;
    }
};
```
